"We've obtained a Liminal Sign.": "...There's one small problem, though."
"...The amount we currently have probably won't be enough."
"...It won't?"
"Liminal Signs have been used to recover a sudden decrease of inner Photons."
"But, in order to achieve that effect, multiple are required."
"...Seriously?"
"How many are we talking here?"
"I don't know the exact amount."
"So in other words, we should find as many as we can."
"Let's hurry and start looking."
"...We're gonna save her."
"Right!"
"Even if we've gotta scour all of Halpha, we'll find 'em!"
"One thing we know now is that Liminal Signs are larger than normal Resta Signs."
"I'll relay the situation to the rest of ARKS and ask for their cooperation."
"Everyone's worried about Manon. They should be more than happy to help."
"I'll call on all able bodies in Retem to help in the search."
"You can count Stia in as well."
"The Survey Team will use our available data to try and narrow down possible search areas."
"Thanks, everyone..."
"Alright, let's get this search effort under way!"
